snippet: The Treasury Department appears to be investigating fees received by former American officials for speaking on behalf of the Mujahedeen Khalq, a group on Washington’s terrorist list.
abstract: Treasury Department appears to be investigating fees received by prominent former American officials for speaking on behalf of an Iranian opposition group, the Mujahedeen Khalq, or People’s Mujahedeen, an organization on State Dept's terrorist list.
lead_paragraph: The Treasury Department appears to be investigating fees received by former American officials for speaking on behalf of the Mujahedeen Khalq, a group on Washington’s terrorist list.

headline.seo: U.S. Supporters of Iranian Group M.E.K. Face Scrutiny
headline.main: U.S. Supporters of Iranian Group Face Scrutiny
headline.print_headline: U.S. Supporters of Iranian Group Face Scrutiny
